thread.title: Sports medicine market to grow at CAGR of 8% to 2020: 5 highlights
thread.title_full: Sports medicine market to grow at CAGR of 8% to 2020: 5 highlights

author: mwood@beckershealthcare.com (Megan Wood)
title: Sports medicine market to grow at CAGR of 8% to 2020: 5 highlights
text:
Sports medicine market to grow at CAGR of 8% to 2020: 5 highlights Written by Megan Wood | Tuesday, 13   
The sports medicine market is expected to grow, based on a Big Market Research report. 
Here are five highlights: 

1. In 2015, the body reconstruction and repair products sector is expected to hold the largest share based on product. 

2. In 2015, the knee injuries sector is expected to hold the largest share of the market based on application. 

3. North America dominates the market, with Europe and Asia-Pacific following. 

4. Asia-Pacific will experience the highest growth rate, especially in India, China and Japan. More international companies, government initiatives and awareness will drive this growth. 

5. The sports medicine market includes small and large companies, with the intensity of competition continuing to increase.
